title: Templates for Trello
content: Trello offers a wide variety of templates to help users organize and manage different types of projects and tasks. These templates are available for various purposes, including project management, team collaboration, personal organization, and specific workflows like design and engineering. Categories include business, design, education, engineering, marketing, HR & operations, personal, productivity, product management, project management, remote work, sales, support, and team management. The templates are designed to streamline workflows and save time, providing a blueprint for various use cases.
